source.name: End of Year Financial Statement
source.assumptions: total amount of taxable is equal to the take / rate. Assumed all non-resident withholding tax 15% assumed all resident holding tax 33%, assumed all corporate tax 28

data.name: Corporate
data.description: A tax on net income of a corporation.

data.name: Non-resident withholding tax
data.description: Tax on profits sent overseas to non-residents.

data.name: Resident withholding tax
data.description: Tax on interest sent overseas to New Zealand residents.

data.name: Capital Gains Tax
data.description: Tax on net profit of asset sales.
